website_summaries.verdict: Looks and feels like a regular backpack, but performs with the reliability of a Coleman cooler.
pros: Includes a dry pack area for extra storage of your personal items
Possible to hold over 20 cans of beverage
cons: This pack tends to leak from the zippers if you tip it over or lay it on its side

customer_reviews.title: Disney World Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: We used this bag for our summer Disney World trip. My boyfriend and I each had one of these. In the morning we would load it with waters and snacks. To avoid having to pack ice packs I froze some bottles of water and put them in there, as they thawed we’d drink them. The front pocket is tight, but it held my poncho, keys, sunscreen, and other items. The bag never leaked during our weeklong trip. We are going back again this summer and this bag is coming with us again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hollick

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but can be great with some ingenuity!
customer_reviews.text: It's not leakproof as the ad would lead you to believe, but I use a dry bag to go inside of the backpack. I filled the dry bag with ice and stuffed it full of beer. Kept everything nice and cold while we walked around the French Quarter in New Orleans during the hottest days of August! Better yet, it kept me dry from not having the melting Ice leak out on me! I'm 5'11" 225lbs. Picture is for sizing reference.
customer_reviews.author: Aric Pelt

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS AWESOME. BOUGHT FOR OUR TRIP TO DISNEY
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AWESOME. BOUGHT FOR OUR TRIP TO DISNEY. KEPT SNACKS & DRINKS COOL ALL DAY. HAS NOW BECOME A STAPLE IN OUR HOME. STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING AND BUY THIS. I USE MINE WEEKLY EVEN IF IT IS JUST BRINGING FOOD TO WORK. CLEAN UP IS SIMPLE FOR ANY SPILLS. EVERY CAMPER/HUNTER/FAMILY NEEDS THIS
customer_reviews.author: Just Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack
customer_reviews.text: I used this to take on a party boat salt water fishing boat. It keeps cold for ever it seems like and with the wet iI was in no water got inside the thermal pouch or the front pouch. I am 300 pounds and I had plenty of room left on the shoulder straps and the waist strap. It far exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend. It also washes very well also, I used hand wash setting on machine and it did fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Excellnet beer cooler!
customer_reviews.text: It is every bit as good as I hoped! I use the sealed ice packs which happen to perfectly fit on all the walls so my beers and cold the entire day. The material and stitching are of great quality. One of my better drinking purchases ever!
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Johnny

customer_reviews.title: It was a good backpack, but I returned it because it didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a good backpack, but I returned it because it didn't really help keep our stuff colder than a regular backpack with icepacks (we also put ice packs in this pack). Our other packs were a bit smaller and better suited to getting on and off the rides at Disneyland easier. This pack was just a bit too bulky once we added the snacks we brought. The straps did start to show some fraying after a couple uses at the park. We weren't rough on it either. If you were going to the beach or on a hike, this pack would be great, but for amusement parks, just a bit too bulky. Amazon returned item with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tricey

customer_reviews.title: Seems coming loose.
customer_reviews.text: How is it that this top of the line commercialed back pack is already tearing at all the seems... used it maybe a handful of times since I bought this less then two months ago... never again.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Toribio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney World Trip
customer_reviews.text: We loaded this up everyday on our 5 day trip. I used a medium cooler shock pack and it kept everything perfect. We don't like the way the free water tastes so we (2 adults,2 kids) would freeze a few bottles of water and place them in the bottom for the evening and throw some room temps in for the daytime. Then we'd load in the sandwiches and lunchables. We'd throw some snacks on top. In the little front pocket went our power bank, cords, and hand wipes. ***Side Note*** We didn't take it to universal since they make you load things in those tiny lockers and the pack with anything in it won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: CheJ

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for a lunch bag to bring to work. Its very spacious: one large zippered insulated compartment large enough for a gallon jug and more; one front zippered pocket with a mesh divider with plenty of room; 2 small mesh side pockets that will fit a sports bottle; comfortably padded shoulder straps as well as a padded waist strap. With a couple ice packs, this cooler will keep my drinks very cold for 10+ hours in the middle of summer. I've also taken this out for strolls in the woods and it's been great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Much Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This Backpack is MUCH SMALLER that what I expected. I live in Florida and occasionally i have to leave groceries in the car..I thought this would be a decent size but I really can't put more than one medium bag of groceries in the Backpack. It's more like something a kid would take to school instead of a lunchbox. The quality seems good. I'm deciding on whether to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: An avid Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: This is very durable no leaking very versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped promptly. We bought this two years ago with the plan to take it to Disneyland for sandwiches Snacks and water. We have used it three times for Disneyland. We froze some of the waters and refrigerated some. This worked really well we had cold food all day long. The only downside was the frozen water made this heavy.Not the fault of the backpack. It was fantastic all three trips no leaking the food stayed cold. We also use it when we camp and go on trails. The water actually stays cold without frozen water. It was a great purchase and would recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanyski

customer_reviews.title: The backpack is comfortable, functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack cooler to carry into work; I'm a nurse that packs a lot of stuff for a 12hr shift and they make us walk about a quarter mile from our parking lot. The backpack is comfortable, functional, and appears to be high quality. I usually put my items into the fridge when I get there so I'm unsure how long it actually keeps things cold. My only "complaint" is that I wish it had more pockets outside of the main compartment! Overall, it's far more comfortable for me to carry than a traditional lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: fantastic backpack cooler
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this to Disney and Universal Studios. I have gone hiking with this for hours at a time in July. It doesn't matter, it keeps whatever I have inside cold as long as I have the right amount of cooling packs. I would say it is a little tight though. you can put in about half a dozen water bottles. I've been able to put in 3 sandwiches, 3 pepsi cans, and two Powerade's and its kept it cold. it also has an additional non cooler pocket for chips and snacks too. Lastly, it has two water bottle pockets which a year later are still real tight and sturdy. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. D. L. Mora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to take lunch to work with you
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband to take his lunch and canteens of water and ice tea to work. LOVE this! Fits a decent bag lunch plus multiple bottled water bottles and tall reusable drink canteens along with reusable lunch ice packs. Also it's really nice looking in person. The product photos make it appear to have a hideous orange and ugly greenish color but it absolutely does not. More of a burnt orange /rust color and neutral colors.
customer_reviews.author: BlueDogsBSK

customer_reviews.title: Love this bookbag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookbag. I use it for work and it seems to being holding up to abuse that it gets from me throwing it around. I work 12 hours shifts and all my food and drinks are still cold at the end of my shift
customer_reviews.author: Travis Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's good but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping with the liner the way it is that it wouldn't leak should ice melt. No such luck. If you are going to use ice packs, this thing is GREAT. If you need to use actual ice, I would recommend lining it yourself with a garbage bag or something, lest you walk around with a wet bottom! Would have given 5 stars if it didn't leak (why wouldn't they make that a design priority since it is going to be carried around???)
customer_reviews.author: dingo7448

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with it's what I was looking for and it works. It does a fantastic job of keeping things cold!!!! I just have 2 gripes that need to be addressed for the next redesign; 1. the shoulder straps are set too far apart or are curved funny or for whatever reason they just pull apart so the backpack is forever sliding off of my back. I am a 5' 11" man with broad shoulders, this should not be happening! 2. the non-cooler pocket is too small. Otherwise, this thing is still way better than my old lunch box style cooler.
customer_reviews.author: JR Fairfax

customer_reviews.title: Great Coleman backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd backpack (exactly the same model, just different color) in 3 years. Used it for work, camping and at the beach. Excellent and was used a lot. Developed a tear in the seam of the zipper of the small pouch. Arm straps are still intact, never got weak. Never leaked and I knew I would buy again if anything ever happened. Thanks, Coleman!
customer_reviews.author: cenobite

customer_reviews.title: Does as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Cooler section holds a lot of stuff. I use ice packs and not loose ice. Things stay cold. Lower compartment willing hold several items. I'm able to get my ipad which is in a protective case inside the netted compartment. The only thing I don't like, and it is annoying, is the thing will not stand up straight. Set it down and it rolls to the front. So you have to set it in a position where you can lean it back against something, and I mean way back.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: perfect bag and well made
customer_reviews.text: this is my all time favorite lunch box good for riding a motorcycle to work and everything not big but enough to hold a lunch and snacks and all your accessories for work got about 5 to 6 inch width inside and normal size bag I will be buying this again cause hate carrying lunch boxes with handle and one strap. So far been hanging it by the little strap on top and no tearing usually thats the first to go since I hang it like that everyday all day
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Size & Quality sold this
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a backpack cooler to use while traveling/transporting automobiles/trucks between dealerships. He prefers to bring his own food/snacks/water, so this is perfect with room for a freeze-pack. There's also room for the paperwork (kept in an organizer); so it gets to stay cold--LOL. He loves it. He used to carry two separate items, so now it's only one! One less to accidentally leave behind, but not this one. My only wish is for other color choices, but there was only one--besides, this wasn't for me to use! He did go to various stores to find a backpack locally, but the quality or size of the others was inferior. This Coleman Backpack Cooler is excellent. >Love-Love<
customer_reviews.author: SunnySky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice little cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is not what you would use for an overnight camp trip, but it works well for a day hike or a few hours on the beach to take lunch and a few drinks. It's plenty big enough inside for ice packs (I wouldn't use ice cubes due to melted water issues) and drinks and containers for food. Straps are comfortable for me. Like some others have said it can get condensation in it, but duh, there is a temperature differential between a cooler and the outside air, soft side coolers tend to do that. Overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and easy to carry. Holds a good amount of stuff and does a decent job of keeping it cool all day. Update, just used this backpack for two days at Walt Disney World. We froze two water bottles and put those into the base and filled with many refrigerated water bottles. The bottles stay cold all day, and even had a little ice left in the last bottles after 12 hours. Tip: if you lay the bottles sideways you can fit many more bottles of water in the bag. I believe we made it fit up to 10 that way.
customer_reviews.author: jrs-34637

customer_reviews.title: Most perfect cooler backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned three different cooler backpacks, and although all of them functioned as they should, none was as perfectly thought out as this one. The size of the main pocket and front pockets are perfect, the straps are comfortable, and it even has netted pockets on BOTH sides so we lefties don't feel slighted like most backpacks. I do wish it came in more appealing or feminine colors, but the functionality is perfect. Oh! And what a bargain! I can hardly believe I paid so little for something so perfect. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion for a day at the beach or a day hike
customer_reviews.text: People can nitpick this all they want, for this price you're getting a nicely made backpack that will keep a lunch and some beverages cool for you while you spend the day in the great outdoors. Maybe you can't fill it to the brim with ice and expect it to be waterproof for ever, but it handles quite a bit of stuff more a small backpack (a few blue ice packs, multiple beverages, a packed lunch or some snacks - just what you need when you're on the move and want to carry things on your back. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Huntington Book Depository

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a class field trip and for uses at theme parks because we are pass holders and go frequently. I like that it is not huge. Outside cupholders were a priority and also a zippered pouch for your personal items. The food and drinks stay cold. I don't know if it leaks because I put ice in a ziplock bag so it doesn't melt all over the place (duh!). I wish it had another smaller outside zippered pouch for easier cell phone storage & access, but otherwise it works well. I foresee using this for our beach trips this summer also. It seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMama

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We ordered it to take to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We ordered it to take to the Indianapolis 500 race. It kept our beverages & food cool. It looks like a real backpack, versus those cooler backpacks that look more like coolers. Unlike the cooler backpacks I saw elsewhere, this one has a waist strap so it feels more secure on your body like a real backpack. I cinched my rain jacket under the elastic cord on the front and used the mesh pockets on either side for a water bottle and sunscreen. Only time will tell if it leaks but so far after a long day at the track, it's held up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Appealing but leaky
customer_reviews.text: The pack looks great and is relatively roomy for your snacks. However, mine had a leak in it and ended up soaking my back. I didnt mind too much as it was super hot when I was out but obviously that's a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It worked beautifully. The only thing I would say is
customer_reviews.text: I used this backpack to keep waters cold for an all day festival. It worked beautifully. The only thing I would say is, the front zipper section WILL get cold so if you house a cellphone or anything electronic be aware. Straps are very comfortable and the waist strap is great for added security.
customer_reviews.author: Candace M. Church

customer_reviews.title: I'm fat, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Are you fat? Do you like a big lunch? Then this sucker is for you! I bought this because I like to pack drinks like 3 or 4 plus my lunch and dinner for a 12hr to 16hr shifts. It works great plus my coworkers don't judge me for bringing in a family sized cooler. Also fits a Thanksgiving sized turkey and a few sides.
customer_reviews.author: Raeannah Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I walk from the parking lot to the job site for a large company. And the walk is roughly 8-10min. During these colder months it's a lifesaver to have this bag - my only gripe is that it doesn't stand upright, wish it were flatter in the bottom. I use a bag ice pack and place it in the very bottom for stability while picking through my bag. Good bag so far, it's not super small, it's ample space for break and lunch. Just have to play a little Tetris with your tupperware. I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: R33NOH

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Meh' it's ok. Works ok for a few water bottles and a few cokes while walking. Just don't accidentally let it fall over on it's side, it will leak out the zipper. We just decided to put ice in a baggie and haven't had any more issues of that. Doesn't keep things super cold but it's a backpack, what do you expect? I'll stick to my coleman hard side for when I don't need the convenience. Make sure not to place anything in it too heavy or sharp, the lining is a little sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: I used only 4 super slim freezer packs and the bag held six bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got it's first test this past weekend - in the 100+ degree weather AT THE BEACH! I used only 4 super slim freezer packs and the bag held six bottles water and some fruits & veggies. Every thing stayed extra cold (not freezing but remember the circumstances) - and I was surprised at how cold my phone/wallet were in the front pouch! I have every faith that it will withstand hikes and camping trips and have even better results. I'm not mad at it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Disney Go-bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to be my Go-bag for days at Disney. Run with two thermos in the side pockets, as well as some frozen water bottles and snacks in the insulated portion. Frozen bottle stay moslty frozen for a whole hot day if I don't take them out. Not a huge bag, but plenty of room in the bag to also keep some disposable ponchos, back up battery cell, small sunscreen. Overall durability of bag has been great. Straps and back of bag are padded and comfortable even when loaded up.
customer_reviews.author: Zo76

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler, not good as a lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to carry, keeps contents cold enough given the price point and material. I expected a larger main compartment and much larger auxiliary pocket. Auxiliary pocket is insulated same as main pocket, but I wouldn't use it for cold products because there isn't room for a cold pack. It would be better if without insulation to make more utility-type storage. Mesh pockets on sides are basically useless due to their size and lack of elasticity. I purchased for use as a work lunchbox (construction job), and it is not particularly suitable for this application. It may be better for day-hiking or family outings to zoos, parks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a day at the beach or lake
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this back in 2017 for a trip. It was easy to pack in luggage and we thought it would work great for taking to the beach to hold adult beverages. And it doesn’t scream “I’m full of alcohol” haha. Now 3 years later -it is still used at least 2-3 x a week and is still in great shape. Keeps those beverages cold at the lake- turn it upside down to drain and it’s ready to go again. Front pocket stays dry. May be the best purchase ever. Well worth the money. Worth twice the money. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellye Wood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used it three times now and not too happy. #1 the pockets on the side are too small and won't allow even a sunscreen bottle in if full. #2 the first time I used the bungee on the front....it ripped. #3 the underside of the straps rubbed my shoulders raw. #4 wascundercthe impression that it was leak proof. Not the case. Leaker. Had a wet bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Denton

customer_reviews.title: You Could Spend More ...
customer_reviews.text: But do you need to? This pack has worked out really well for me. I use it to keep beer and maybe some snacks cold while responsibly social-distancing outdoors. I use Cooler Shock ice packs (conveniently available on Amazon) and it will keep beers cold for 24hrs. I imagine it would also do that for any other canned beverage but I can personally only vouch for beer. The advertised capacity is greatly reduced when using ice packs or packing tallboys.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This thing held breastmilk all day while I flew from ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing held breastmilk all day while I flew from the west coast to the east coast & kept it cold. I inserted some ice packs which were all still cold 12 hours later and didn't have any issues with leaking. Passed through airport security & fit in the overhead really well. It was a bit smaller than I had expected but did what I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. It’s very roomy, and the quality is great. I use it for work where it gets 100+ degrees in the summer, and it gets loaded to the max with drinks/ice packs. I haven’t had any fraying of the straps or any sign of wear in that way.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for Theme Parks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we went to California during the kids breaks to do the theme parks. It was used to store fruit,, sandwiches and cheese and crackers. To keep it cool we also put to medium sized baggies filled with ice wrapped in a towel to absorb moister. Bottom line it kept the food cool all day and the ice lasted over 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: lpm

customer_reviews.title: This is comfortable to wear and so practical!
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids have allergies and are on special diets. That means carrying food everywhere! This backpack holds a lot of food, is well designed so easy to carry. It keeps food cold. I bought one for my daughter and one for myself for road trips and camping. Now I bought this one for my other daughter when she has to shop and take the bus. We love this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: L. Allward

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for a trip to Southern California. we did Disneyland, Universal, San Diego Zoo, Beaches, etc... each time I packed 12 refrigerated bottles of water with no additional ice or icepacks. We got to Disney around 8:00am and it was about 92 degrees by 11:00am. we drank the water throughout the day using the last bottles around 3:00 pm. they weren't ice cold but they were cool enough to still enjoy. Not bad for just packing cold water. worked well all week and saved us money as most of the places we visited charge between $3.75 and $4.25 for a bottle of water.
customer_reviews.author: A Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute, best backpack cooler I've found. Lightweight, comfortable to carry when full, lots of pockets, keeps items cold (I also added a freeze pack inside the backpack). Wasn't certain I'd like the look but LOVE it in person. Would highly recommend this purchase if you're looking for a backpack cooler!
customer_reviews.author: P. Thaxton

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing lunch and water on hikes and car trips
customer_reviews.text: This backpack worked great during our trip to Yellowstone and the Grand Tetons. We packed it full of large water bottles (some frozen) and other cold lunch items. The smaller front section worked well for my sons medical supplies that need to stay cool. Rain ponchos tucked in the elastic band on the outside, and sunscreen and lip balm stayed put in the side pockets. It was also comfortable to wear when filled and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Land

customer_reviews.title: Non bulky backpack very nice looking cooler backpack that has held up
customer_reviews.text: Bag does what it claims very well. The material on the back part of the bag that goes against the back is a bit fragile so just beware of what you put it as it can get nicked but it is a very minimal issue. The bag has not had any other problems at all. fairly tight due to its insulation but still adequate room it isn't bulky on the outside which is a plus & has a nice color to it that does not fade with use & time.
customer_reviews.author: Where There's a Will, There's a Way

customer_reviews.title: Good back,
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice backpack, used it a dozen times or so, but for me it’s a bit small. Has never leaked, just wish it was larger, kind of hard to put more then a six pack and a couple of sandwiches in it. So if it’s something for a short day, or lunch it will be fine. It keeps everything quite cold, even had items in it for 8 hours still cold.
customer_reviews.author: gmptls

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable. We purchased this cooler backpack for our ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable. We purchased this cooler backpack for our theme park vacation, and wore it for long, long days. The padded straps were great on shoulders. It kept things moderately cool with ice, if we were able to use ice packs I believe it would work better. Ice completely melted inside the bag but did not leak. We were with friends who were using a different brand of cooler backpack, and they had many issues with leaking out of their bag, which was very uncomfortable for the bag-wearer. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: christine bender

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your beer cold!!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is dope! Fits like a normal backpack. I am 6' 180lbs and I can wear this thing comfortably. Plus it has plenty of compartments to store your personal items. I will say if you plan to use ice put that in a plastic bag because the backpack itself isn't exactly water tight. I used so ice packs and it worked great. This time of year in Austin it is HOT so I have been bringing this down to the river. Depending on how many times I open it I can get a cold beer out of it for 4-5 hours, after that they will just be chilled.
customer_reviews.author: mthilljr

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality. This thing isn't going to break anytime soon. We use it as a regular backpack sometimes. plenty of space for drinks for 2 people. ADVISORY: it will leak if the level of melted ice reaches the zipper or if you turn the bag upside down. That is to be expected as I'm not aware of waterproof zippers. You can fill the bag with ice past the zipper just not water. That gives you about six inches for melt which is about 5 or 6 hours if full of ice. If longer than that we simply pour out the melt.
customer_reviews.author: C b

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack cooler.
customer_reviews.text: We used it during our Spring Break trip to Florida. It was comfortable to carry with 12 cans and sufficient ice to be out in the sun for 5-6 hours. It didn't leak and kept everything cold. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: blmac1962

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack cooler
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! I've used it a handful of times now and I am always impressed with how long it keeps things cold. I took it with tubing down a river (5+ hours) in the sun and everything inside stayed cold and ice didn't melt completely! It is roomy so it is easy to overpack "beverages" and then make it really heavy to carry.. but that isn't an awful thing. :)
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things COOL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for our Universal Studios trip. It kept our snacks and drinks cool even though it was 100+ in Orlando. The 2 side pockets were great to keep our h2o bottles w/o falling off. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bag before going to the beach to carry drinks and snacks in. We have two large dogs, so we needed something hands free instead of using a traditional cooler. The bookbag is a good size, holds a lot of stuff (we packed it full) and does not show signs of wear and tear with the heavy weight of all the stuff we packed. It's a good quality, very durable material and does not leak! We will using this for all sorts of events/vacations where we want to pack food or drinks in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Love

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice little insulated backpack. Bought for hiking with the kids and picnic lunches but found myself using daily to bring lunch to work. Has held up well with daily use
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels durable but leaks
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this cooler for when I go to the pool or tailgate. Easy to carry and fits a lot of drinks. It unfortunately leaks as ice is melting which is frustrating. Can’t exactly put it on your back when leaking as it makes a mess. Disappointed as I was assuming it being Coleman, it would be better quality which is why I paid more for it vs other products just like It.
customer_reviews.author: Timilation

customer_reviews.title: Three years and still like new
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a convention i was attending and I wanted to keep sandwiches cold while we attended seminars and what not. It worked great! I got home and started using it for my lunches at work. That was three years ago and it still is in excellent condition. The elastic straps on the side are still strong. The color hasnt faded. All straps and buckles are like the day I bought it. If I spill a little bbq sauce, no biggie, throw it in the washer. I cant think of a more practical and ergonomic way to carry lunch every day. Dear coleman, add molle straps and camo pattern. It would be the ideal hunting cooler
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Surprised....
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by this Cooler packs ability to keep water in a Ortlieb 10L bladder cold all day laying in the bottom of my canoe with only a couple of those smaller blue cold packs to cool it. I did fill the bladder the night before and keep it in the fridge until I put it in the pack but still, Cold water after a day in the sun is impressive to me. If something happens to this pack and the price hasn't gone outrageously high, I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cloyd R.

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to have something to use for trips to zoos, museums, and other places with our son. Something when our big cooler is too much. It works and doesn't hold too too much but it does the job. We did use ice and when my husband bent over just a little the ice water leaked. So it's not a full motion bag, but it just sits in our stroller while our son walks around.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know they existed until a friend showed up in the beach with it, I live in Florida and go frequently to the beach and amusement parks, we always go with coolers to the beach, but collers to the amusement park was uncomfortable. This product combines both, making it easy to move around with cool drinks and fresh foods. it has a very good quality finish from Coleman. A variety of colors would be nice, not a fan of the brown, but love the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney trips.
customer_reviews.text: We have annual passes to Disney and this backpack is a huge money saver. We put a reusable ice bag in it, then take carrots, fruits, sandwiches, and other food items, and they stay cold all day, not freezing, but cold enough that you feel comfortable eating the item after 6 hours. Disney security has no problem with it, and I like it has a waistband strap, wish it had a chest strap as well, but LOVE the backpack!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Not quite like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The backpack itself seems fine and hopefully will serve it's purpose. The issue I have is the large pocket is insulated and the smaller front one is not. Pictures all over the internet of this backpack show sandwiches and whatever else sticking out of the front pocket. That gives the impression that the front pocket would be insulated as well, which is why I bought it and to use the larger pocket as storage. Hopefully it will keep lunch cold regardless, but I would not have bought it knowing only one pocket is insulated.
customer_reviews.author: CIA Surveillance Van #3

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeding expectations
customer_reviews.text: This cooler bag is PERFECT. I bought it for the beach and kayaking as I live in hot Florida weather. The size and capacity are perfect. I find myself reaching for this bag for every trip I take. Highly recommended. The large insulated pocket fits drinks and lunch/snacks for two. The front pockets hold phones/keys/chapstick etc. I have never found myself out of room.
customer_reviews.author: Lunaloo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for work
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in construction and has to bring all his tools and his lunch up to the job site. This makes it very convenient for him to just put on his back and have free hands to carry his work stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M.

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these bags now
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bagpack. It is a fantastic Disney bag. You can fit loads of water and food and basic necessities in the front. I would not steer anyone away from this bag. The only downside is that the front pouch is a little small. Other than that it is perfect for Mickey's not so scary. Throw a couple of frozen water bottles in the back and bring home as much candy as you can carry.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on vacation to Texas during August when it was hot, hot, hot and humid. It worked great in keeping our water bottles cold. We did put the ice in baggies and not directly in the bag so I do not know if it would have leaked once the ice melted, but our water was cold later in the day when we needed it. Worked as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Iv e been using this bag for almost 2 months now.. I LOVE IT!!! It carries a bunch of stuff I need and the cooler is a good size to fit good amount of food. Keeps cool It's been holding strong and only thing I see, its a little dirty but thats just common for everyday use. If your looking for a cooler backpack... BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oryo

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good backpack. We've taken it to the beach, road trips, and ball games. I usually use Cooler Shock ice packs, so I don't know if it leaks or not. I've loaded it with the Cooler Shock, canned drinks and bottled water before work in the morning and left it in my car a few times this summer with temperatures over 90. My drinks were still cold 10-11 hours later. Just note that this is pretty much a lined backpack. The insulation, if any, is not thick. But if you need to keep stuff cold for 8-12 hours, this does the job. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler backpack for vacations and outings
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack cooler. I use on every vacation To carry drinks snacks and everything else that we need for our outings. It is perfect size not too small but not so big that you feel like you're carrying too much. Front pocket stays dry. The padded shoulders are Comfortable and the color is neutral so anyone can carry.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would of found this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler backpack! It's great for bike riding, hiking or just taking to the beach. I freeze a couple of water bottles to help keep can drinks cold instead of taking up space with ice or ice packs. I have only put in about 8 can drinks and 2-3 frozen water bottles, does leave room for more. Does not seem to leak, again I haven't tried putting ice in there, if I did I would probably use zip lock bags. Even full it's not heavy and it's comfortable to wear. There is inside pockets to keep things dry like, keys and phone, etc. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: northjetty

customer_reviews.title: Great for theme parks
customer_reviews.text: Theme parks (like Disney World and Universal Orlando) generally have a limit to the size of soft-cooler you can bring in their park. However, this is a "backpack" not a cooler, so they don't even look twice at it when checking it through security. I bring cooler packs, cold drinks, sandwiches, snacks, etc. into the theme parks frequently. It's a great way to keep your food/drinks cool even on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kees

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof - water leaks out
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely not leak proof. We poured in some ice, 4 frozen water bottles and 6 beer bottles for a picnic on a cloudy day (74 deg F) for about 5 hours outside. The bottles did remain cold but the ice started melting and there was leakage on the outside of the bag. This was the very first time we used this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Backpack Cooler for the Win!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack cooler, normally take it to my volleyball games and it can fit quite a few bears along with my 40oz water bottle. Like that it has a front pocket to put keys, wallet, non wet things. It is comfortable to carry, I carried it when it was full around a bike race for several hours and it didn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be my lunch box and sneak beers into the softball park with! It holds way to many beers, which is a GOOD thing! It's perfect for my lunch, as I'm a truck driver. It keeps things cold for hours. Highly recommend for any activity! Can't wait for the summer to try this out in the heat!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while new
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these. First in September of 2015. Then two in 2017. The zippers have broken on all, but the first had lasted the longest. The last one barely made it 4 months. One zipper would break on the main pocket and I'd just use the other zipper for a bit, but not long after, it would fail also. I would not overload it, usually a couple of 32 oz. water bottles and lunch/snacks for the day. Your mileage may vary. Loved it while new, but the zipper failing issue is enough for me not to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed/ would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately you can’t leave negative star feed back. Very disappointed in product as it is very poorly constructed. First backpack out of the amazon box had shoulder strap freying almost off. Replacement backpack arrived and first day of using it the same thing had happened and had ripped off. And unfortunately can’t do anything about the product now as it was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Desimone

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof!
customer_reviews.text: I like this backpack. It is the perfect size and holds everything you need for a day trip hiking, etc. It is only waterproof while it is upright. It will leak if it tips over, etc where the zipper is. I have read others say it gets their back wet when carrying it, but I haven't experienced that yet. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: stglide13

customer_reviews.title: Was great for the first two months
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to edit my review. I initially gave it five stars because it didn’t leak and it was fantastic but now I would say one star because of the leakage. This cooler worked fantastic when I first got it. I used it from February to March and it never leaked. I put it away and then I took it out again for the summer and it’s a disaster all it does is leak all over the place. I’m not sure what happened and why it’s leaking all of a sudden but I am very disappointed in this cooler at this point because the bottom is soaking wet Will not hold the amount of cans specified with ice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Discher

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up on sale for $17. Looks like a regular backpack. Works very well. I put ice in a large ziplock bag and the ice lasts a long time. Of course is not as good as a regular cooler but if your expectations are not that high you will be happy with this purchase. Perfect for the resort that doesn't allow coolers. They will never know.
customer_reviews.author: Markymark

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack cooler on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best portable cooler / backpack on the market! I love this. You can take all the beer, food, drinks, and other goodies without worrying about it spilling everywhere in the inside of the bag. it has a water sealed main compartment that you can store all this in.
customer_reviews.author: the pieces of reeses

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Backpack cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is the Bomb! Great backpack that is a cooler and truly keeps everything cold. It is lightweight and well constructed with comfortable straps. I purchased this for my son who rides a motorcycle to work. He told me it's the best thing ever as he takes it on job sites and it stays cold.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made backpack with a thermal lining to keep foods warm or cold if that’s how you want to use it. I used it to pack sandwiches and water for a hike with my grandsons, everything stayed cool and was safe to eat after we reached our picnic area several hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda & Gayle Welch

customer_reviews.title: So Handy!
customer_reviews.text: The versatile backpack really keeps food cold! And, can be used even when one doesn't need the cooler function It is comfortable to wear on long walks . The neutral color is good for travel. The elastic on the outside is handy to stow a jacket or whatever. Check the size, as it is a somewhat smaller than normal backpacks. The smaller size though makes it comfortable to wear when the inside is full of food.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disneyland
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack back for when I'm out and about with my kids and need to take snacks and drinks with us. I love it! It's looks like a back pack, but kept everything cold throughout the whole day. Was perfect for our trip to Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: WadeB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for hikes and beach visits, and it fits the bill perfectly for that. It's a comfortable backpack, looks like a regular back pack (handy if you do not want to advertise that it is a cooler), and holds enough drinks/food for a small (2-4 person) trip. Coleman is a dependable brand, and for the price I paid for this, it was a steal, great value, and getting a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays sports during summertime and it’s a whole day affair. I pack this lunch bag by 10am. it will have his lunch, fruits, yogurt and a couple of juice packets placed between two frozen Pyrex cold packs. Sometimes I pack a little extra and I find that it stays cool when i am taking it out at 6:30-7pm once my son is back home. So I am really glad I bought this for him!
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, holds a lot, keeps ice cold, no leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent backpack cooler. Holds plenty of beverage as well as ice, plus a front pocket for snacks or personal items. We used to carry a six-pack with a full, 8-lb bag of ice. The cooler doesn't leak upright (unless tipped over, then some leakage through zippered area). There was even still ice left overnight in a tropical climate. Everyone we came in contact with wanted one for themselves. Well constructed, fits well, carries well, convenient side pockets for little items. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: d3

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Keeps ice for several hours and keeps drinks cold for 12 hours or so, even in heat. Do note that if you have melted ice, and are wearing the bag, if you lean hard or bend over, the melted water will come out from the zipper area. So if you bend over to tie your shoes, expect a wet back or neck
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, front pocket good for holding cell, keys, wallet, etc. Side (mesh) pocket is a plus. Good for hiking as coolness permeates to your back - hidden bonus. On the downside - it's described as holding 28 cans - 18-20 is more realistic, especially if you want to add ice.. And if you pour ice in over the top, the zippers are not waterproof, so eventually, as ice melts, it leaks out the zippers. Better design would be to have a shorter zipper just across the top. Otherwise use sealed, re-freezable packaging ice, or put ice cubes in zip-lock bags. Overall, decent value.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for when you need to keep drinks on ice while on the go.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the zipper is not a complete seal, so the water will leak from the top if you do not keep the bag standing up. As long as you can remember to keep it up, it is an awesome product. Have used it for events, golfing, etc and kept everything nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thalin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and spacious
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for Disney but use it weekly! Perfect for us soccer moms who need to keep beverages cool and not have to wheel around a cooler. Keeps beverages cold and is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Tirsa Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: So, so awesomely great.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE back you take to the beach. Camping. Parties with friends. Great zipper action. Great feel. Great comfort. Do yourself the favor. Honestly. And USE it. Don't toss it under your bed and forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Maksza

customer_reviews.title: Not a good lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good lunchbox. The bottom is not flat and cannot stand up. Not big enough for larger foos storage containers. The belt is worthless, i cut mine off. It's good for holding drinks for road trips and hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Myers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack will try out at disney and see how it keeps the items cool or cold. Worked out really nice, kept items really cold all day in 89 degree weather. was a good choice to buy !! Has a cooler pocket for storing those items you want to keep cold, and holds alot. and has a smaller pocket on the front for dry goods, along with two side pockets for bottles. Nice back pack, glad i bought it. good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stuff cold. Zipper leaks though :/
customer_reviews.text: Keeps stuff cold even on the beach! Works well with Cooler Shock mid size freeze packs. Unfortunately the zipper is not leak proof. Some ice had melted after a day in the sun and cold water went down my back when I knelt down. Shocker! The bag serves its purpose, but not recommended for bag to turn over or to keep much ice rather than ice packs in the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Barely kept things cold for a hour!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very disappointing. Other than the ability to hold a 12 pack and having nicely padded straps, it didn't work. It leaked horribly and barely kept items cold for a hour. It was totally useless and I wish I never purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler backpack. Used it this summer while traveling thru the canyons of Arizona and Utah. It did a good job of keeping our drinks cold for several hours. My only comment would be that after awhile it does have a tendency to have water (from melting ice) seep through the bag alittle. But we were using it in 90-100 degree heat. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: S Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disneyland or disneyworld!
customer_reviews.text: Used this at my trip to disneyworld and it was perfect! Never leaked any water and was the perfect size. Was very comfortable and fit into all of the lockers. It saved us a ton of money to bring drinks and snacks into the park. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love this backpack, holds a lot and keeps everything plenty cold. Very comfortable to wear. I accidentally shut the car door with the strap hanging out and broke the black plastic waste buckle. Anyone know where I can get a replacement buckle? Definitely my fault and not a product issue. Would absolutely recommend this item and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: MayflowerMom

customer_reviews.title: Great size for 2 or 3
customer_reviews.text: My family loves it for lunches on zoo, museum, park outings. Really only enough room for 2-3 lunches though...
customer_reviews.author: Layne mccarley

product_meta.title: Coleman Soft Backpack Cooler
product_meta.description: Keep your food and snacks cool from the park to the campsite with a Coleman Backpack Cooler. This stylish bag is large enough to hold 28 cans. Extra padding in the back and waist make it even easier to carry over almost any distance. The BPA- and phthalate-free, heat-welded main compartment is perfect for using with ice and the zippered front pocket lets you store extra snacks and small gear. The bungee cord on the front also provides quick access to other items. Antimicrobial, product-protecting properties are built into the flexible lining to resist odor, mold and mildew, making it easy to clean between uses.
feature_bullets: INSULATION: Main compartment keeps contents cold and prevents leaks with heat-welded seams
EASY TO CARRY: Backpack design with adjustable padded straps for maximum comfort
EXTRA STORAGE: Large front pocket for quick access to napkins and accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
